settings.editor: "We can't become what we want by remaining what we are."

settings.description_text_b: A coach helps discussion and enables everyone to understand the psychology of the team, ultimately driving performance.
Your friendships are diverse, so you need diversity in how you approach them.
You continually risk losing focus and potential if you’re not centered on creating strategies to develop and reach your goals

settings.editor: Testimonials from the folks who changed their lives - for better.

slides.content: "Joanna has been working with me for nearly a year now and what an eventful year it has been. Joanna’s guidance, support and honesty have helped me not only navigate some tricky life changes but have also helped me achieve some lifelong goals.  I would recommend her coaching services to anyone - Thank you Joanna!"
slides.name: Daphne Ralph
slides.title: IT CEO

slides.content: "I trained to be a life coach with Joanna in 2017 and it’s one of the best things I’ve ever done. She really made me believe I could do this and changed my life in the process. I now have a thriving business and I owe much of this to the input I’ve had from this dedicated, wonderful lady. I highly recommend Joanna’s services in coaching!"
slides.name: Mary Gettyson
slides.title: Hairdresser

slides.content: First, I just want to say thank you! Of all of the programs and seminars that I have done (and there have been a lot), Melissa's guidance is hands down the one that has made the biggest impact in my life. It has been life changing, for the best, of course. Thank you, Melissa
slides.name: Ira Turlington
slides.title: Model and writer
